name: Synthrun
description:
Synthrun is an action-platformer where you take control of "Jake", a boy trapped in an abstract world.
The goal is to collect the energy orbs at the end of each level.
Can you collect all 50 and help Jake escape?Features- Race through an abstract track with pumping music in the background.

- Use 4 cool powers to help you through.
- There are over 50 unique levels to complete!Steam Features- Steam Achievements, the game has 10 achievements.
- Steam Leaderboards.
